sentences.en: All the paintings are startlingly dramatic as a result of their depth of field and colour.
sentences.cn: 景深和色彩的运用令所有的画作都展现出令人惊叹的戏剧性效果。

sentences.en: He fuses ancient and modern instruments of the minstrel and forges a startlingly unique musical language.
sentences.cn: 他将古代和现代的吟游诗人的乐器融合为一体,锻造出令人惊奇的独特的音乐语言.

sentences.en: Mr. Loueke, 34, has quickly earned a reputation in jazz circles as a startlingly original voice.
sentences.cn: 34岁的卢韦凯,以他惊人的原创新声在爵士圈快速扬名.

sentences.en: One of the most startlingly positive phenomena for many generations to unfold around the world.
sentences.cn: 很多代人以来最令人震惊的乐观现象之一继续在全球不断呈现.

sentences.en: She laughed a very small silvery laugh , startlingly like a child's laughter.
sentences.cn: 她小声笑起来,那声音非常清脆,竟然象个小孩子.

sentences.en: Then, startlingly, the back door was jerked open by Binton.
sentences.cn: 然后，令人吃惊的是，后门被宾顿猛地拉开了。

sentences.en: There were thirty years between them, yet in a way they looked startlingly alike.
sentences.cn: 他们之间相差三十岁, 但是在某一方面,看去又非常相象.

sentences.en: This quote startlingly original novel unquote is both boring and badly written.
sentences.cn: 这部所谓的‘不同凡响的小说’云云,内容既枯燥、文笔又拙劣.
